summary: This is my first mod. I did not like Karliah's face when I met her, so I used NPC editor to change her face. I uploaded this file so that I can download them later if anything happens to my PC. Feel free to use it if you wish.
descriptionHtml:
There are 4 versions of this mod (hair change only). Try the one you like.

Installation:

1)Drag and Drop the files in the .rar file into the Data folder in your Skyrim directory.
2)Check Karliah.esp in the "Data files" menu in the Skyrim Launcher.
3)Open game and go to Karliah in the game, you'll see that her face has changed.

Uninstallation:

Uncheck Karliah.esp in Data Files in the Launcher. Delete the files if you want later.
author: Bethesda99
